channel.title: How to add this stuff...look inside
channel.description:
how do i add a highscores inside the game? how do i add fishing in camelot. how do i make anti syi...meaning no syi can spam my server. how do i add system update.such as.....system update in 10 minutes.
i got delta source.

item.title: How to add this stuff...look inside
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

1.) not sure but if i find a guide i will give you the link

2.) A fishing spot is an npc so get the id and add it to autospawn.cfg and make it stationary

3.) already got some guides

4.) there is a thing called ipanel look for a tutorial on how to make it (go to the tutorials section and use the search box)

Read full topic
item.source: How to add this stuff...look inside

item.title: How to add this stuff...look inside
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

bobby1:

help needed on how to make highscores ingame/how to make fihing spot in camelot

whats the difference between that and this:

[quote=“bobby1, post:1, topic:350341”]how do i add a highscores inside the game?
how do i add fishing in camelot.
how do i make anti syi…meaning no syi can spam my server.
how do i add system update.such as…system update in 10 minutes.

i got delta source.[/quote]

You can easily figure these things out, there are tutorials on half of them, and for number 2, are you really serious? but I’ll tell you one thing, fishing spots are NPC’s

item.title: How to add this stuff...look inside
item.dc:creator: @IfearI IfearI
item.description:
@IfearI wrote:

[quote=“bobby1, post:1, topic:350341”]how do i add a highscores inside the game?
how do i add fishing in camelot.
how do i make anti syi…meaning no syi can spam my server.

i got delta source.[/quote]

Used the search button?

  1. You mean like a scoreboard inside? or like a site with everyone’s stats?
    Creating Highscores Via MySQL

  2. You’re serious?

  3. Multiple Ways to prevent SYI’ers
    Anti-Flood,Null,SYI [HashMap’s]
    How to add anti syi BEST WAY connection filter tutorial REVISED BETTER!

Read full topic
